Add updateToday() for code resuse and help ensure a recent value is used

Force date into view upon JumpTo[Date|Today]

Feels like a hack - probably not ideal to call smoothScrollToPosition
on *every* call to notifyDataSetChanged

Does not solve the problem of the incomplete
scroll to the bottom, when toggling isTodayAtTop
